amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-698 as En Bloc No. 5: Nos. 71, 72, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 78, 79, 80, 81, 82, 83, 84, 85 and 86.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A010) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A010) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
